content: प्राकृत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ता-ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [प्रकृतेरयं प्रकृत्या निर्वृत्तो वा अण्] {@--1@} Original, natural, unaltered, unmodified; स्याताममित्रौ मित्रे च सहजप्राकृतावपि <ls>Śi. 2. 36</ls> (see <ls>Malli.</ls> thereon). {@--2@} Usual, common, ordinary. {@--3@} Uncultivated, vulgar, unrefined, illiterate; प्राकृत इव परिभूयमानमात्मानं न रुणत्सि <ls>K. 146</ls>; <ls>Bg. 18. 28.</ls> {@--4@} Insignificant, unimportant, trifling; <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Derived from Prakṛti, <ab>q. v.</ab>; प्राकृतो लयः ‘reabsorption into Prakṛti.’ {@--6@} Provincial, vernacular (as a dialect); see below. --तः A low man, an ordinary or vulgar man. --तं A vernacular or provincial dialect derived from and akin to Sanskrit; प्रकृतिः संस्कृतं तत्र भवं तत आगतं च प्राकृतं <ls>Hemacandra</ls>. (Many of these dialects are spoken by the female characters and inferior personages of Sanskrit plays); तद्भवस्तत्समो देशीत्यनेकः प्राकृतक्रमः <ls>Kāv. 1. 33</ls>; also <ls n="Kāv. 1.">34</ls>, <ls n="Kāv. 1.">35</ls>; त्वमप्यस्मादृशजनयोग्ये प्राकृतमार्गे प्रवृत्तोऽसि <ls>Vb. 1.</ls>
